input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Ability to speak english has a direct effect on the forest. The smoker has a direct effect on the forest. For people who do not speak english, the probability of the forest on fire is 87%. For people who speak english, the probability of the forest on fire is 53%. For people who speak english, would it be more likely to see the forest on fire if the person did not speak english?
